评论详情: The color was as lovely as shown online. The fabric of the solid dresses was actually very synthetic and created massive static cling. Great for humid climates. Modest dress but the sewn lines fell awkwardly just below the curve of (the bottom) and wasn’t the most attractive fit (I am 5-11” and much curvier on the bottom half:) It would work better for a less curvy person I think. Could be the static too. Easily wrinkled. Not a good travel dress.

It’s a beautiful dress! I’m 5’2”, 108 lbs. I ordered a small; I typically wear a small or extra small, depending on the brand. The length was perfect, I wore the dress with boot that have a low heel. I received many compliments! The dress arrived promptly and exactly as advertised! I plan on buying more!

I bought this in black for my dad's funeral. It's pretty, comfortable and fits perfectly. I'm 5'6" and 140 lbs and bought a medium. The top part is elasticy and snug, but not tight, and the rest is flowy. The fabric thickness is perfect also. (It's not at all see through.) I may eventually buy one in a different color for a happier occasion.
So cute, even fit my pregnant belly! Comfortable, love the thickness of the material, great value!

I'm 5'2" and a little curvy in the hips. This dress wasn't too long (as most long dresses are on me). It is comfortable and flattering. The only thing it is missing is pockets! I received multiple compliments on it.

It’s always a gamble shopping online but especially on Amazon. When I received it, it looked like the photo, was lightweight but very comfortable. I also noticed someone complaining it was see thru but mine had a solid green layer underneath so you couldn’t see anything. I was very happy I didn’t have to find a slip to wear. Also, I washed it on delicate in a laundry bag and hung dried it. I may buy another one since I was happy with this one. Note I am 5’4” and weight about 141lbs and I purchased a small. If you lift a lot or have a wider back a medium may be needed. I fit into the small fine but if I had been doing heavy bench, it may have been a little tight.

Bought this last minute for a lowkey wedding dinner and I got so many compliments on it. I’m a plus size and dresses can be a tricky fit even in XXL, a 1x in the plus size category tends to fit me better. But this dress fit so well and hugged all the right places while silhouetting my body gracefully. Would definitely recommend.
